title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 267: Featuring Connor McDavid + Elvis Merzlikins
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Connor McDavid and Elvis Merzlikins. McJesus joins (20:22) to talk about his leg injury last year, the Oilers turn around, driving cross country and a bunch more. The guys also discuss opening golf courses, some NHL signings, Stranger Things and a ton more. The boys are then joined by Elvis Merzlikins (1:00:31) to discuss growing up in Lugano, his run with the Blue Jackets, Torts and lots more. The guys wrap up with a big announcement about an NHL20 tournament and their schedule moving forward.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
